full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED BYA BA 'DI NI MCHOD DPON PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG SKAL RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA 'BYUNG NGAM SNYAM PAS BSAM PAS BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYI, BLA MA DGONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA RTEN @005A *, ,NAS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NON PA'I TGOGS MCHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO'I TSOGS LA CHAGS SO BZOD PAR GSOL CUNG ZAD DGE BA'I BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN MI MTHUN PHYOGS LA RNAM PAR RGYAL GYUR CIG , ,,)
